name: IMDb - old design approximation + unfixed width
description:
An attempt to make IMDb more beareble by trying to make it look more like the old version. 

UPDATES
2010-04-03 - Fixed broken table with movie cast and finally removed background from top and bottom of the page; also changed width of table with discussions on /board movie subpage and coloring of even rows in cast table and discussions table
2008-09-22 - Action box style changed
2008-09-04 - I incorporated fixes suggested by Digeratist
2008-09-02 - IMDb fixed the page width to 1024 pixels, I made changes to counter this design update, so the full width of monitor will be used as seen in the screenshots
